title: Sri Lanka - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Sri Lanka stands at SD with n/a outlook. Moody's credit rating for Sri Lanka was last set at Ca with stable outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Sri Lanka was last reported at RD with n/a outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Sri Lanka thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Sri Lanka as reported by major credit rating agencies.
